doc: Account identifiers provided by the OAuth2 provider
name: account

fields.name: email
fields.doc: The email associated with the OAuth2 provider's authenticated account.

fields.name: userID
fields.doc: The provider's user identifier for the authenticated user

fields.name: provider
fields.doc: The oauth provider who supplied the account information

fields.name: createdBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who created the record

fields.name: updatedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who updated the record

fields.name: deletedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who deleted the record
